Content: You are standing at the entrance of a dark cave. Do you want to go in or leave?
It's pitch black inside the cave. Suddenly you hear a growl. Do you want to keep going or run away?
You have stumbled upon a treasure chest. The adventure was worth it!
You made it out of the cave just in time to see a bear coming out. You are safe now.
You decide it's better not to risk it and walk away from the cave. Sometimes it's wiser to leave some puzzles unsolved.
